properties.areaDesc: Winthrop Harbor to Wilmette Harbor IL; Wilmette Harbor to Northerly Island IL; Northerly Island to Calumet Harbor IL
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Warning issued February 12 at 2:59PM CST until February 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Heavy
Freezing Spray Warning, which is in effect from 6 AM Thursday to
midnight CST Thursday night.

* WINDS...North gales to 35 kt.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...to 12 ft.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...to 16 ft.

* ICE ACCUMULATIONS...moderate to heavy.
properties.instruction:
A Gale Warning means winds of 34 to 47 knots are imminent or
occurring. Operating a vessel in gale conditions requires
experience and properly equipped vessels. It is highly
recommended that mariners without the proper experience seek safe
harbor prior to the onset of gale conditions.

A Heavy Freezing Spray Warning means heavy freezing spray is
expected to rapidly accumulate on vessels. These conditions can
be extremely hazardous to navigation. It is recommended that
mariners not trained to operate in these conditions or vessels
not properly equipped to do so...remain in port or avoid the
warning area.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON CST THURSDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT
